title: Ping Meter
body:
I dont know if this idea has ever come up but i think it would be a really good idea if:
we could get a meter or anything that shows our ping before we queue up for a game

i think i speak for everyone that this is extremely useful especially since the game is so anal
so far the only way i know how to check my ping is to create a custom game with bots but i think having a meter would be nice.

rito pls

replies.body: Isn't it easier to go to Speedtest.net and just check your speeds, takes about 30secs to 1 min :0
Uh, the speed test isnt at the riot server where you want to test from..
it says mine is good but i get over 10,000 ping
speed test isn't always accurate for me.

^^^^^

I would love this! I test my connection these days by first loading a custom game, rather annoying but.
